TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DateAndTime extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含用於日期和時間作業的程序和屬性。

span.span: The module contains the procedures and properties used in date and time operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和執行階段程式庫成員，取得目前的日期或時間、 執行日期計算傳回日期或時間、 設定日期或時間，或處理程序的持續時間的時間。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that get the current date or time, perform date calculations, return a date or time, set the date or time, or time the duration of a process. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Today`屬性來傳回目前的系統日期。This example uses the `Today` property to return the current system date. ```vb Dim thisDate As Date thisDate = Today ```

span.span: Dates and Times Summary
Keywords (Visual Basic)

summary.span: 傳回包含日期和時間值，且已加入指定時間間隔的值。

span.span: Returns a value containing a date and time value to which a specified time interval has been added.

span.span: A value containing a date and time value to which a specified time interval has been added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`DateAdd`函式來加入或減去指定的時間間隔開始的日期。You can use the `DateAdd` function to add or subtract a specified time interval from a date. 例如，您可以計算目前或前的 45 分鐘的時間現在起 30 天的日期。For example, you can calculate a date 30 days from today or a time 45 minutes before now. 若要將天數`DateValue`，您可以使用`DateInterval.Day`， `DateInterval.DayOfYear`，或`DateInterval.Weekday`。To add days to `DateValue`, you can use `DateInterval.Day`, `DateInterval.DayOfYear`, or `DateInterval.Weekday`. 這些會被視為對等項目因為`DayOfYear`和`Weekday`不是有意義的時間間隔。These are treated as equivalent because `DayOfYear` and `Weekday` are not meaningful time intervals. `DateAdd`函式從未傳回無效的日期。The `DateAdd` function never returns an invalid date. 如有必要，產生的日期的日期部分是在產生的 year 中產生的每月的最後一天向下調整。If necessary, the day part of the resulting date is adjusted downward to the last day of the resulting month in the resulting year. 下列範例會將一個月新增至年 1 月 31 日：The following example adds one month to January 31: ```vb Dim NextMonth As Date = DateAdd(DateInterval.Month, 1, #1/31/1995#) ``` 在此範例中，`DateAdd`會傳回`#2/28/1995#`，而非`#2/31/1995#`。In this example, `DateAdd` returns `#2/28/1995#`, not `#2/31/1995#`. 如果`DateValue`已`#1/31/1996#`，它會傳回`#2/29/1996#`因為 1996年是否為閏年。If `DateValue` is `#1/31/1996#`, it returns `#2/29/1996#` because 1996 is a leap year. > [!NOTE] > `DateAdd` 會使用目前的行事曆設定，從的屬性類別中命名空間。`DateAdd` uses the current calendar setting from the property of the class in the namespace. 預設值值取決於**控制台**設定。The default values are determined by **Control Panel** settings. 因為每個`Date`值受到結構，其方法讓您加入的時間間隔中的其他選項。Since every `Date` value is supported by a structure, its methods give you additional options in adding time intervals. 例如，您可以在其中新增小數的天數，為四捨五入到最接近的毫秒，`Date`變數，如下所示：For example, you can add a fractional number of days, rounded to the nearest millisecond, to a `Date` variable as follows: ```vb Dim NextTime As Date = Now ' Current date and time. NextTime = NextTime.AddDays(3.4) ' Increment by 3 2/5 days. ``` `Interval`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `Interval` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|StringString|要加入的時間間隔單位Unit of time interval to add| |-----------------------|------------|----------------------------------| |`DateInterval.Day`|dd|一天;截斷為整數值Day; truncated to integral value| |`DateInterval.DayOfYear`|yy|一天;截斷為整數值Day; truncated to integral value| |`DateInterval.Hour`|hh|小時;四捨五入為最接近的毫秒數Hour; rounded to nearest millisecond| |`DateInterval.Minute`|nn|分鐘;四捨五入為最接近的毫秒數Minute; rounded to nearest millisecond| |`DateInterval.Month`|mm|月份;截斷為整數值Month; truncated to integral value| |`DateInterval.Quarter`|qq|季;截斷為整數值Quarter; truncated to integral value| |`DateInterval.Second`|秒s|第二個;四捨五入為最接近的毫秒數Second; rounded to nearest millisecond| |`DateInterval.Weekday`|ww|一天;截斷為整數值Day; truncated to integral value| |`DateInterval.WeekOfYear`|wwww|每週;截斷為整數值Week; truncated to integral value| |`DateInterval.Year`|yyyyyyyy|年份;截斷為整數值Year; truncated to integral value| ## Examples 此範例會採用一個日期，並使用`DateAdd`函式中，指定未來月數就會顯示對應的日期。This example takes a date and, using the `DateAdd` function, displays a corresponding date a specified number of months in the future. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#25)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`DateDiff`函式來判斷兩個日期/時間值之間有多少的指定的時間間隔。You can use the `DateDiff` function to determine how many specified time intervals exist between two date/time values. 例如，您可以使用`DateDiff`來計算兩個日期或今天與一年結尾之間的週數之間的天數。For example, you might use `DateDiff` to calculate the number of days between two dates, or the number of weeks between today and the end of the year. ## 行為Behavior - **參數的處理。****Treatment of Parameters.** `DateDiff` 值減去`Date1`的值從`Date2`產生差異。`DateDiff` subtracts the value of `Date1` from the value of `Date2` to produce the difference. 這兩個值會變更呼叫程式中。Neither value is changed in the calling program. - **傳回值。****Return Values.** 因為`Date1`並`Date2`屬於`Date`資料型別，它們保存日期和時間值精確度為 100 奈秒刻度系統計時器。Because `Date1` and `Date2` are of the `Date` data type, they hold date and time values accurate to 100-nanosecond ticks on the system timer. 不過，`DateDiff`一律會傳回時間間隔數目`Long`值。However, `DateDiff` always returns the number of time intervals as a `Long` value. 如果`Date1`代表更新的日期和時間會比`Date2`，`DateDiff`傳回的負數的數字。If `Date1` represents a later date and time than `Date2`, `DateDiff` returns a negative number. - **一天的間隔。****Day Intervals.** 如果`Interval`設定為`DateInterval.DayOfYear`，則會視為相同`DateInterval.Day`，因為`DayOfYear`時間間隔內不是有意義的單位。If `Interval` is set to `DateInterval.DayOfYear`, it is treated the same as `DateInterval.Day`, because `DayOfYear` is not a meaningful unit for a time interval. - **一週的間隔。****Week Intervals.** 如果`Interval`設定為`DateInterval.WeekOfYear`，傳回的值表示包含的一週的第一天之間的週數`Date1`和 包含的一週的第一天`Date2`。If `Interval` is set to `DateInterval.WeekOfYear`, the return value represents the number of weeks between the first day of the week containing `Date1` and the first day of the week containing `Date2`. 下列範例示範如何從不同的結果會產生。 `DateInterval.Weekday`。The following example shows how this produces different results from `DateInterval.Weekday`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#60)] 在上述範例中，`DateDiff`會傳回 0，`wD`因為兩個日期之間的差異是不超過七天的資料，但它會傳回 1 到`wY`因為七天之間差異的個別的行事曆的第一天週數。In the preceding example, `DateDiff` returns 0 to `wD` because the difference between the two dates is less than seven days, but it returns 1 to `wY` because there is a seven-day difference between the first days of the respective calendar weeks. - **較大的間隔。****Larger Intervals.** 如果`Interval`設定為`DateInterval.Year`，傳回的值會計算完全從的年部分`Date1`和`Date2`。If `Interval` is set to `DateInterval.Year`, the return value is calculated purely from the year parts of `Date1` and `Date2`. 同樣地，傳回值`DateInterval.Month`純粹從年份和月份的部分引數，以及計算`DateInterval.Quarter`從包含兩個日期的季數。Similarly, the return value for `DateInterval.Month` is calculated purely from the year and month parts of the arguments, and for `DateInterval.Quarter` from the quarters containing the two dates. 例如，當比較年 12 月 31 日的下一年度，1 年 1 月`DateDiff`會傳回 1，如`DateInterval.Year`， `DateInterval.Quarter`，或`DateInterval.Month`，即使過了最多只能有一天。For example, when comparing December 31 to January 1 of the following year, `DateDiff` returns 1 for `DateInterval.Year`, `DateInterval.Quarter`, or `DateInterval.Month`, even though at most only one day has elapsed. 文化特性，例如具有多個紀元，日文`DateDiff`方法不會傳回年份差異，如果差異會跨越兩個或多個紀元。For cultures such as Japanese that have multiple eras, the `DateDiff` method does not return a difference in years if the difference spans two or more eras. 相反地，您可以在其中計算所傳回的值中的差異屬性，如下列範例所示： `date2.Year - date1.Year`。Instead, you can calculate the difference in values returned by the property, as shown in the following example: `date2.Year - date1.Year`. - **其他的間隔。****Other Intervals.** 因為每個`Date`值受到結構，其方法讓您在尋找時間間隔中的其他選項。Since every `Date` value is supported by a structure, its methods give you additional options in finding time intervals. 比方說，您可以使用`Subtract`其多載形式幾種方法：減去從`Date`變數，以傳回另一個`Date`的值，並減去`Date`值要傳回。For example, you can use the `Subtract` method in either of its overloaded forms: subtracts a from a `Date` variable to return another `Date` value, and subtracts a `Date` value to return a . 您可以計算時間的程序，以瞭解花費，如下列範例所示的毫秒數。You can time a process to find out how many milliseconds it takes, as the following example shows. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#61](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#61)] `Interval`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `Interval` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|字串值String value|時間差異的單位Unit of time difference| |-----------------------|------------------|-----------------------------| |`DateInterval.Day`|"d""d"|DayDay| |`DateInterval.DayOfYear`|"y""y"|DayDay| |`DateInterval.Hour`|"h""h"|HourHour| |`DateInterval.Minute`|"n""n"|MinuteMinute| |`DateInterval.Month`|"m""m"|月份Month| |`DateInterval.Quarter`|"q""q"|季Quarter| |`DateInterval.Second`|"s""s"|SecondSecond| |`DateInterval.Weekday`|"w""w"|一週Week| |`DateInterval.WeekOfYear`|「 ww""ww"|行事曆週Calendar week| |`DateInterval.Year`|"yyyy""yyyy"|YearYear| `DayOfWeek`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `DayOfWeek` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`FirstDayOfWeek.System`|00|系統設定中指定的週第一天First day of week specified in system settings| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Sunday`|11|星期日 （預設值）Sunday (default)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Monday`|22|星期一 （符合 ISO 8601 標準，節 3.17）Monday (complies with ISO standard 8601, section 3.17)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Tuesday`|33|星期二Tuesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Wednesday`|44|週三Wednesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Thursday`|55|星期四Thursday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Friday`|66|週五Friday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Saturday`|77|星期六Saturday| `WeekOfYear`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `WeekOfYear` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`FirstWeekOfYear.System`|00|在 系統設定中指定年份的第一週First week of year specified in system settings| |`FirstWeekOfYear.Jan1`|11|週中年 1 月 1 日 （預設值）Week in which January 1 occurs (default)| |`FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFourDays`|22|至少包含四天 （符合 ISO 8601 標準，節 3.17） 新的一年中的週Week that has at least four days in the new year (complies with ISO standard 8601, section 3.17)| |`FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFullWeek`|33|在新的一年中的第一個完整星期First full week in the new year| ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`DateDiff`函式來判斷兩個日期/時間值之間有多少的指定的時間間隔。You can use the `DateDiff` function to determine how many specified time intervals exist between two date/time values. 例如，您可以使用`DateDiff`來計算兩個日期或今天與一年結尾之間的週數之間的天數。For example, you might use `DateDiff` to calculate the number of days between two dates, or the number of weeks between today and the end of the year. ## 行為Behavior - **參數的處理。****Treatment of Parameters.** `DateDiff` 值減去`Date1`的值從`Date2`產生差異。`DateDiff` subtracts the value of `Date1` from the value of `Date2` to produce the difference. 這兩個值會變更呼叫程式中。Neither value is changed in the calling program. - **傳回值。****Return Values.** 因為`Date1`並`Date2`屬於`Date`資料型別，它們保存日期和時間值精確度為 100 奈秒刻度系統計時器。Because `Date1` and `Date2` are of the `Date` data type, they hold date and time values accurate to 100-nanosecond ticks on the system timer. 不過，`DateDiff`一律會傳回時間間隔數目`Long`值。However, `DateDiff` always returns the number of time intervals as a `Long` value. 如果`Date1`代表更新的日期和時間會比`Date2`，`DateDiff`傳回的負數的數字。If `Date1` represents a later date and time than `Date2`, `DateDiff` returns a negative number. - **一天的間隔。****Day Intervals.** 如果`Interval`設定為`DateInterval.DayOfYear`，則會視為相同`DateInterval.Day`，因為`DayOfYear`時間間隔內不是有意義的單位。If `Interval` is set to `DateInterval.DayOfYear`, it is treated the same as `DateInterval.Day`, because `DayOfYear` is not a meaningful unit for a time interval. - **一週的間隔。****Week Intervals.** 如果`Interval`設定為`DateInterval.WeekOfYear`，傳回的值表示包含的一週的第一天之間的週數`Date1`和 包含的一週的第一天`Date2`。If `Interval` is set to `DateInterval.WeekOfYear`, the return value represents the number of weeks between the first day of the week containing `Date1` and the first day of the week containing `Date2`. 下列範例示範如何從不同的結果會產生。 `DateInterval.Weekday`。The following example shows how this produces different results from `DateInterval.Weekday`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#60)] 在上述範例中，`DateDiff`會傳回 0，`wD`因為兩個日期之間的差異是不超過七天的資料，但它會傳回 1 到`wY`因為七天之間差異的個別的行事曆的第一天週數。In the preceding example, `DateDiff` returns 0 to `wD` because the difference between the two dates is less than seven days, but it returns 1 to `wY` because there is a seven-day difference between the first days of the respective calendar weeks. - **較大的間隔。****Larger Intervals.** 如果`Interval`設定為`DateInterval.Year`，傳回的值會計算完全從的年部分`Date1`和`Date2`。If `Interval` is set to `DateInterval.Year`, the return value is calculated purely from the year parts of `Date1` and `Date2`. 同樣地，傳回值`DateInterval.Month`純粹從年份和月份的部分引數，以及計算`DateInterval.Quarter`從包含兩個日期的季數。Similarly, the return value for `DateInterval.Month` is calculated purely from the year and month parts of the arguments, and for `DateInterval.Quarter` from the quarters containing the two dates. 例如，當比較年 12 月 31 日的下一年度，1 年 1 月`DateDiff`會傳回 1，如`DateInterval.Year`， `DateInterval.Quarter`，或`DateInterval.Month`，即使過了最多只能有一天。For example, when comparing December 31 to January 1 of the following year, `DateDiff` returns 1 for `DateInterval.Year`, `DateInterval.Quarter`, or `DateInterval.Month`, even though at most only one day has elapsed. 文化特性，例如具有多個紀元，日文`DateDiff`方法不會傳回年份差異，如果差異會跨越兩個或多個紀元。For cultures such as Japanese that have multiple eras, the `DateDiff` method does not return a difference in years if the difference spans two or more eras. 相反地，您可以在其中計算所傳回的值中的差異屬性，如下列範例所示： `date2.Year - date1.Year`。Instead, you can calculate the difference in values returned by the property, as shown in the following example: `date2.Year - date1.Year`. - **其他的間隔。****Other Intervals.** 因為每個`Date`值受到結構，其方法讓您在尋找時間間隔中的其他選項。Since every `Date` value is supported by a structure, its methods give you additional options in finding time intervals. 比方說，您可以使用`Subtract`其多載形式幾種方法：減去從`Date`變數，以傳回另一個`Date`的值，並減去`Date`值要傳回。For example, you can use the `Subtract` method in either of its overloaded forms: subtracts a from a `Date` variable to return another `Date` value, and subtracts a `Date` value to return a . 您可以計算時間的程序，以瞭解花費，如下列範例所示的毫秒數。You can time a process to find out how many milliseconds it takes, as the following example shows. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#61](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#61)] `Interval`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `Interval` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|字串值String value|時間差異的單位Unit of time difference| |-----------------------|------------------|-----------------------------| |`DateInterval.Day`|"d""d"|DayDay| |`DateInterval.DayOfYear`|"y""y"|DayDay| |`DateInterval.Hour`|"h""h"|HourHour| |`DateInterval.Minute`|"n""n"|MinuteMinute| |`DateInterval.Month`|"m""m"|月份Month| |`DateInterval.Quarter`|"q""q"|季Quarter| |`DateInterval.Second`|"s""s"|SecondSecond| |`DateInterval.Weekday`|"w""w"|一週Week| |`DateInterval.WeekOfYear`|「 ww""ww"|行事曆週Calendar week| |`DateInterval.Year`|"yyyy""yyyy"|YearYear| `DayOfWeek`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `DayOfWeek` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`FirstDayOfWeek.System`|00|系統設定中指定的週第一天First day of week specified in system settings| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Sunday`|11|星期日 （預設值）Sunday (default)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Monday`|22|星期一 （符合 ISO 8601 標準，節 3.17）Monday (complies with ISO standard 8601, section 3.17)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Tuesday`|33|星期二Tuesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Wednesday`|44|週三Wednesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Thursday`|55|星期四Thursday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Friday`|66|週五Friday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Saturday`|77|星期六Saturday| `WeekOfYear`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `WeekOfYear` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`FirstWeekOfYear.System`|00|在 系統設定中指定年份的第一週First week of year specified in system settings| |`FirstWeekOfYear.Jan1`|11|週中年 1 月 1 日 （預設值）Week in which January 1 occurs (default)| |`FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFourDays`|22|至少包含四天 （符合 ISO 8601 標準，節 3.17） 新的一年中的週Week that has at least four days in the new year (complies with ISO standard 8601, section 3.17)| |`FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFullWeek`|33|在新的一年中的第一個完整星期First full week in the new year| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`DateDiff`函式來顯示給定的日期和今天之間的天數。This example uses the `DateDiff` function to display the number of days between a given date and today. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用`DatePart`函式來評估日期/時間值，並傳回特定的元件。You can use the `DatePart` function to evaluate a date/time value and return a specific component. 例如，您可以使用`DatePart`來計算目前的小時或天。For example, you might use `DatePart` to calculate the day of the week or the current hour. 如果您選擇`DateInterval.Weekday`for`Interval`引數，傳回的值是一致的值`FirstDayOfWeek`列舉型別。If you choose `DateInterval.Weekday` for the `Interval` argument, the returned value is consistent with the values of the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration. 如果您選擇`DateInterval.WeekOfYear`，`DatePart`會使用並類別的命名空間，以判斷您目前的設定。If you choose `DateInterval.WeekOfYear`, `DatePart` uses the and classes of the namespace to determine your current settings. `FirstDayOfWeekValue`引數會影響使用的計算`DateInterval.Weekday`並`DateInterval.WeekOfYear``Interval`設定。The `FirstDayOfWeekValue` argument affects calculations that use the `DateInterval.Weekday` and `DateInterval.WeekOfYear` `Interval` settings. `FirstWeekOfYearValue`引數會影響指定的計算`DateInterval.WeekOfYear`如`Interval`。The `FirstWeekOfYearValue` argument affects calculations that specify `DateInterval.WeekOfYear` for `Interval`. 因為每個`Date`值受到結構，其方法讓您在擷取日期/時間部分的其他選項。Since every `Date` value is supported by a structure, its methods give you additional options in retrieving date/time parts. 例如，您可以在其中取得的完整日期值`Date`的時間值的變數設定為午夜，如下所示：For example, you can obtain the entire date value of a `Date` variable, with the time value set to midnight, as follows: ```vb Dim CurrDatTim As Date = Now ' Current date and time. Dim LastMidnight As Date = CurrDatTim.Date ' At midnight. ``` `Interval`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `Interval` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|StringString|要傳回的日期/時間值的一部分Part of date/time value to return| |-----------------------|------------|----------------------------------------| |`DateInterval.Day`|dd|月中的日 (1 到 31)Day of month (1 through 31)| |`DateInterval.DayOfYear`|yy|年中的日 (1 到 366)Day of year (1 through 366)| |`DateInterval.Hour`|hh|HourHour| |`DateInterval.Minute`|nn|MinuteMinute| |`DateInterval.Month`|mm|月份Month| |`DateInterval.Quarter`|qq|季Quarter| |`DateInterval.Second`|秒s|SecondSecond| |`DateInterval.Weekday`|ww|週中的日 (1 到 7)Day of week (1 through 7)| |`DateInterval.WeekOfYear`|wwww|年中的週 (1 到 53)Week of year (1 through 53)| |`DateInterval.Year`|yyyyyyyy|YearYear| `FirstDayOfWeekValue`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `FirstDayOfWeekValue` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`FirstDayOfWeek.System`|00|系統設定中指定的週第一天First day of week specified in system settings| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Sunday`|11|星期日 （預設值）Sunday (default)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Monday`|22|星期一 （符合 ISO 8601 標準，節 3.17）Monday (complies with ISO standard 8601, section 3.17)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Tuesday`|33|星期二Tuesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Wednesday`|44|週三Wednesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Thursday`|55|星期四Thursday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Friday`|66|週五Friday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Saturday`|77|星期六Saturday| `FirstWeekOfYearValue`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `FirstWeekOfYearValue` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`FirstWeekOfYear.System`|00|在 系統設定中指定年份的第一週First week of year specified in system settings| |`FirstWeekOfYear.Jan1`|11|週中年 1 月 1 日 （預設值）Week in which January 1 occurs (default)| |`FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFourDays`|22|至少包含四天 （符合 ISO 8601 標準，節 3.17） 新的一年中的週Week that has at least four days in the new year (complies with ISO standard 8601, section 3.17)| |`FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFullWeek`|33|在新的一年中的第一個完整星期First full week in new year| ## Examples 此範例會採用一個日期，並使用`DatePart`函式中，會顯示發生之年的季。This example takes a date and, using the `DatePart` function, displays the quarter of the year in which it occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 98 或 Windows 2000 中，兩位數年份的`Year`引數解譯根據使用者定義的電腦設定。Under Windows 98 or Windows 2000, two-digit years for the `Year` argument are interpreted based on user-defined computer settings. 預設值是從 0 到 29 的值會解譯為年份 2000年 2029 之間，而且從 30 到 99 的值會解譯為 1930年 1999年年。The default settings are that values from 0 through 29 are interpreted as the years 2000-2029, and values from 30 through 99 are interpreted as the years 1930-1999. 如需所有其他`Year`引數，使用四位數年份，例如 1924年。For all other `Year` arguments, use a four-digit year; for example, 1924. 舊版 Windows 的解譯兩位數年份，根據先前所述的預設值。Earlier versions of Windows interpret two-digit years based on the defaults described previously. 若要確保函式會傳回適當的值，請使用四位數字`Year`。To be sure the function returns the proper value, use a four-digit `Year`. 下列範例示範負值，零，而正數的引數值。The following example demonstrates negative, zero, and positive argument values. 在這裡，`DateSerial`函式會傳回`Date`代表前一年在目前的年份; 的前 10 年的 3 月的第一天一天換句話說，年 2 月前十年的最後一天。Here, the `DateSerial` function returns a `Date` representing the day before the first day of March in the year 10 years before the current year; in other words, the last day of February ten years ago. ```vb Dim EndFeb As Date = DateSerial(-10, 3, 0) ``` 如果有任一`Month`或`Day`超過其一般的範圍，它會套用到下一個較大單位適當地。If either `Month` or `Day` exceeds its normal range, it is applied to the next larger unit as appropriate. 比方說，如果您指定了 32 天，它會評估為一個月和一到四天，根據的值從`Month`。For example, if you specify 32 days, it is evaluated as one month and from one to four days, depending on the value of `Month`. 如果`Year`是大於 9999，或如果任何引數超出範圍-2,147,483,648 到 2,147,483,647，就會發生錯誤。If `Year` is greater than 9999, or if any argument is outside the range -2,147,483,648 through 2,147,483,647, an error occurs. 如果三個引數所指定的日期早於 1 月 1 年的 1 日或更晚 23:59:59 年 12 月 31 日的 00:00:00 9999，就會發生錯誤。If the date specified by the three arguments is earlier than 00:00:00 on January 1 of the year 1, or later than 23:59:59 on December 31, 9999, an error occurs. `Date`資料型別包含時間元件。The `Date` data type includes time components. `DateSerial` 所有為 0 時，這些設定，使傳回的值代表的導出的一天開始。`DateSerial` sets all of these to 0, so the returned value represents the beginning of the calculated day. 因為每個`Date`值受到結構，其方法讓您在組合中的其他選項`Date`值。Since every `Date` value is supported by a structure, its methods give you additional options in assembling a `Date` value. 例如，您可以使用其中一個多載建構函式來擴展`Date`變數使用的元件所需的組合。For example, you can use one of the overloaded constructors to populate a `Date` variable using the desired combination of components. 下列範例會設定`NewDateTime`至 1978 年 6 的十分之一秒之前在早上 8:30 的：The following example sets `NewDateTime` to May 6, 1978 at one tenth of a second before 8:30 in the morning: ```vb Dim NewDateTime As Date = New Date(1978, 5, 6, 8, 29, 59, 900) ``` ## Examples 這個範例會使用`DateSerial`函數來傳回指定的年、 月和日的日期。This example uses the `DateSerial` function to return the date for the specified year, month, and day. remarks.format: ## Remarks `DateString` 傳回系統日期 MM dd yyyy 格式會使用縮寫的月份名稱。`DateString` returns the system date in the MM-dd-yyyy format, which uses the abbreviated month name. 接受的格式的日期是 M d yyyy，M d y，yyyy/m/m/y。The accepted formats for the date are M-d-yyyy, M-d-y, M/d/yyyy, and M/d/y. 這是適用於所有的系統地區設定，除了使用雙位元組字元集 (DBCS)。This is true for all system locales except those that use a double-byte character set (DBCS). 如果系統地區設定使用雙位元組字元集， `DateString` yyyy 為 yyyy-mm-dd 格式傳回系統日期。If the system locale uses a double-byte character set, `DateString` returns the system date in the yyyy-MM-dd format. 系統地區設定使用來設定**時鐘、 語言和地區**中的項目**控制台**。The system locale is set by using the **Clock, Language, and Region** item in **Control Panel**. **附註**`DateString`屬性會傳回只以 yyyy 為 yyyy-mm-dd 格式的系統日期`zh`（簡體中文）， `ko` （韓文），和`ja`（日文） 的系統地區設定，如果您正在執行中的 Visual BasicSilverlight。**Note** The `DateString` property returns the system date only in the yyyy-MM-dd format for the `zh` (Chinese simplified), `ko` (Korean), and `ja` (Japanese) system locales if you are running Visual Basic within Silverlight. 取得或設定目前的系統時間`String`，使用屬性。To get or set the current system time as a `String`, use the property. 若要取得目前的系統日期或時間，格式為您的地區設定或自訂格式，提供屬性設函式，指定預先定義或使用者定義的日期/時間格式。To get the current system date or time in the format of your locale, or in a custom format, supply the property to the function, specifying either a predefined or user-defined date/time format. 下列範例為其示範。The following example demonstrates this. ```vb MsgBox("The formatted date is " & Format(Now, "dddd, d MMM yyyy")) ``` 若要存取與目前的系統日期`Date`，使用屬性。To access the current system date as a `Date`, use the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定系統日期或時間需要 unmanaged 程式碼的權限，這可能會影響在部分信任情況下執行。Setting the system date or time requires unmanaged code permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[程式碼存取權限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 下列範例會使用`DateString`屬性來顯示目前的系統日期。The following example uses the `DateString` property to display the current system date. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`StringDate`只包含數字 1 到 12 由有效的日期分隔符號分隔`DateValue`可辨識的順序，如月、 日和年根據指定的系統的簡短日期格式。If `StringDate` includes only numbers from 1 through 12 separated by valid date separators, `DateValue` recognizes the order for month, day, and year according to the Short Date format specified for your system. `DateValue` 會使用目前的行事曆設定，從的屬性類別中命名空間。`DateValue` uses the current calendar setting from the property of the class in the namespace. 預設值值取決於**控制台**設定。The default values are determined by **Control Panel** settings. 您可以設定連線，覆寫的簡短日期格式的屬性類別中命名空間。You can override the Short Date format by setting the property of the class in the namespace. `DateValue` 會辨識長、 縮寫，以及數值格式的月份名稱。`DateValue` recognizes month names in long, abbreviated, and numeric form. 例如，除了辨識 12/30/1991年和 12/30/91 `DateValue` 1991 年 12 月 30 和 1991 年 12 月 30，也會辨識。For example, in addition to recognizing 12/30/1991 and 12/30/91, `DateValue` also recognizes December 30, 1991 and Dec 30, 1991. 如果年份部份`StringDate`省略，則`DateValue`會使用您的電腦的系統日期的目前年份。If the year part of `StringDate` is omitted, `DateValue` uses the current year from your computer's system date. 如果`StringDate`引數包含時間資訊`DateValue`不包含它在傳回的值。If the `StringDate` argument includes time information, `DateValue` does not include it in the returned value. 不過，如果`StringDate`包含無效的時間資訊，例如 「 89: 98"就會發生錯誤。However, if `StringDate` includes invalid time information, such as "89:98", an error occurs. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`DateValue`函式，將字串轉換成日期。This example uses the `DateValue` function to convert a string to a date. 您也可以使用日期常值直接指派至日期`Object`或是`Date`變數，例如`oldDate = #2/12/69#`。You can also use date literals to directly assign a date to an `Object` or `Date` variable, for example, `oldDate = #2/12/69#`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列範例示範負值，零，而正數的引數值。The following example demonstrates negative, zero, and positive argument values. `TimeSerial`函式會傳回代表正午或 45： 上午 8:00 前三個小時前 15 分鐘的時間。The `TimeSerial` function returns a time representing 15 minutes before three hours before noon, or 8:45:00 AM. ```vb Dim alarmTime As Date = TimeSerial(12 - 3, -15, 0) ``` 如果有任一`Minute`或`Second`超過其一般的範圍，它會套用到下一個較大單位適當地。If either `Minute` or `Second` exceeds its normal range, it is applied to the next larger unit as appropriate. 比方說，如果您指定 75 分鐘，它會評估為 1 小時 15 分鐘。For example, if you specify 75 minutes, it is evaluated as one hour and 15 minutes. `TimeSerial` 這是在一天內的秒數減少模數 86,400 的總秒數。`TimeSerial` reduces the total seconds modulo 86,400, which is the number of seconds in a day. 因此，傳回的時間一律為 00:00:00 和 23:59:59 之間。Therefore, the returned time is always between 00:00:00 and 23:59:59. `Date`資料型別包括日期元件。The `Date` data type includes date components. `TimeSerial` 會將所有這些為 1，因此傳回的值表示 1 年的第一天。`TimeSerial` sets all of these to 1, so the returned value represents the first day of the year 1. 不過，如果引數的值會導致計算出的時間超過 24 小時，一天會遞增為必要。However, if the values of the arguments cause the calculated time to exceed 24 hours, the day is incremented as necessary. 在下列範例中，值`Hour`和`Minute`導致時間合計超過 24 小時。In the following example, the values of `Hour` and `Minute` result in a combined time of more than 24 hours. ```vb MsgBox(TimeSerial(23, 75, 0)) ' The preceding statement displays "1/2/0001 12:15:00 AM". ``` 如果引數的值會產生負面的計算時間，日期資訊設為 1/1/0001 和時間資訊會調整為是 00:00:00 到 23:59:59 之間。If the values of the arguments result in a negative calculated time, the date information is set to 1/1/0001 and the time information is adjusted to be between 00:00:00 and 23:59:59. 不過，如果計算出的時間小於負 24 小時，就會發生錯誤。However, if the calculated time is less than negative 24 hours, an error occurs. 因為每個`Date`值受到結構，其方法讓您在組合中的其他選項`Date`值。Since every `Date` value is supported by a structure, its methods give you additional options in assembling a `Date` value. 例如，您可以採用的其中一個多載建構函式來擴展`Date`變數使用的元件所需的組合。For example, you can employ one of the overloaded constructors to populate a `Date` variable using the desired combination of components. 下列範例會設定`newDateTime`至 1978 年 6 的十分之一秒之前在早上 8:30 的：The following example sets `newDateTime` to May 6, 1978 at one tenth of a second before 8:30 in the morning: ```vb Dim newDateTime As Date = New Date(1978, 5, 6, 8, 29, 59, 900) ``` ## Examples 下列範例會使用`TimeSerial`函數來傳回指定的小時、 分和秒的時間。The following example uses the `TimeSerial` function to return a time for the specified hour, minute, and second. remarks.format: ## Remarks `TimeString` 一律會傳回系統時間為"Hh"，這是 24 小時制格式。`TimeString` always returns the system time as "HH:mm:ss", which is a 24-hour format. 此格式會因文化特性而異，這表示即使您變更，並不會變更它**地區選項**中**控制台**。This format is culture-invariant, which means it does not change even if you change the **Regional Options** in **Control Panel**. 取得或設定為目前的系統日期`String`，使用屬性。To get or set the current system date as a `String`, use the property. 若要取得目前的系統日期或時間，格式為您的地區設定或自訂格式，提供屬性設函式，指定預先定義或使用者定義的日期/時間格式。To get the current system date or time in the format of your locale, or in a custom format, supply the property to the function, specifying either a predefined or user-defined date/time format. 下列範例為其示範。The following example demonstrates this. ```vb MsgBox("The formatted time is " & Format(Now, "hh.mm.ss.fff tt")) ``` 若要存取目前的系統時間`Date`，使用屬性。To access the current system time as a `Date`, use the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定系統日期或時間需要 unmanaged 程式碼的權限，這可能會影響在部分信任情況下執行。Setting the system date or time requires unmanaged code permission, which might affect its execution in partial trust situations. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[程式碼存取權限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 這個範例會使用`TimeString`屬性來顯示目前的系統時間。This example uses the `TimeString` property to display the current system time. span.span: An integer value containing a number representing the day of the week.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的值`Weekday`函式對應至值`FirstDayOfWeek`列舉; 也就是說，1 代表星期日而 7 表示星期六。The value returned by the `Weekday` function corresponds to the values of the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration; that is, 1 indicates Sunday and 7 indicates Saturday. > [!NOTE] > `Weekday` 會使用目前的行事曆設定，從的屬性類別中命名空間。`Weekday` uses the current calendar setting from the property of the class in the namespace. 預設值值取決於**控制台**設定。The default values are determined by **Control Panel** settings. `DayOfWeek`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `DayOfWeek` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`FirstDayOfWeek.System`|00|系統設定中指定的週第一天First day of week specified in system settings| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Sunday`|11|星期日 （預設值）Sunday (default)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Monday`|22|星期一 （符合 ISO 8601 標準，節 3.17）Monday (complies with ISO standard 8601, section 3.17)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Tuesday`|33|星期二Tuesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Wednesday`|44|週三Wednesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Thursday`|55|星期四Thursday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Friday`|66|週五Friday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Saturday`|77|星期六Saturday| ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Weekday`函式來取得一週的星期幾，從指定的日期。The following example uses the `Weekday` function to obtain the day of the week from a specified date. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#57](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#57)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的字串`WeekdayName`取決於輸入的引數，但也**地區選項**的 Windows 控制台中**控制台**。The string returned by `WeekdayName` depends not only on the input arguments, but also on the **Regional Options** settings specified in the Windows **Control Panel**. > [!NOTE] > `WeekdayName` 會使用目前的行事曆設定，從的屬性類別中命名空間。`WeekdayName` uses the current calendar setting from the property of the class in the namespace. 預設值值取決於**控制台**設定。The default values are determined by **Control Panel** settings. `FirstDayOfWeekValue`引數可以具有下列設定的其中一個。The `FirstDayOfWeekValue` argument can have one of the following settings. |列舉值Enumeration value|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`FirstDayOfWeek.System`|00|指定在系統中的每週的第一天設定 （預設值）First day of week specified in system settings (default)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Sunday`|11|星期日Sunday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Monday`|22|星期一 （符合 ISO 8601 標準，節 3.17）Monday (complies with ISO standard 8601, section 3.17)| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Tuesday`|33|星期二Tuesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Wednesday`|44|週三Wednesday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Thursday`|55|星期四Thursday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Friday`|66|週五Friday| |`FirstDayOfWeek.Saturday`|77|星期六Saturday| ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Weekday`函數來取得一週的星期幾，從指定的日期，然後`WeekDayName`函式來取得的工作日名稱，從其數字。The following example uses the `Weekday` function to obtain the day of the week from a specified date, and then the `WeekDayName` function to obtain the name of the weekday from its number.
